name: Eclipse Solargraph
tagline: Eclipse Ruby plugin based on the Solargraph language server.
body:
### Welcome to the Eclipse Solargraph update site!
It is recommended to download and install the plugin via the Eclipse Marketplace, but you can select *Help* -> *Install New Software* -> *Add...* and enter the address of this webpage in the *Location* field. Click *OK*, select the Ruby Solargraph plugin that appears in the list and move on with the installation!

### Help, feature requests and issues
Simply head to the [issues](https://github.com/PyvesB/eclipse-solargraph/issues) section and open a new issue. For more general information, simply go to the project [home](https://github.com/PyvesB/eclipse-solargraph).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
